hero.title: 1024GB Cloud Storage
hero.description: Easy to use, private and secure, reliable.
hero.footer: Your free and secure cloud storage by MegaBox

features.feature1: Stream your videos instantly from anywhere, on any device, with no buffering. Experience seamless playback with our advanced cloud streaming technology.
features.feature2: Your files are encrypted and safely stored in the cloud, accessible only by you. Enterprise-grade security ensures your data remains private and protected.
features.feature3: Upload videos with a single click and share them securely with your team or friends. Organize your content effortlessly with our intuitive interface.
features.feature4: Enjoy your videos in stunning HD and 4K quality, with adaptive streaming that adjusts to your connection speed for the best viewing experience.

step1.title: Sign Up & Upload
step1.desc: Create your free account and upload your first video in seconds. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to get started.

step2.title: Organize & Manage
step2.desc: Easily organize your videos into folders and manage your content. Keep everything tidy and accessible.

step3.title: Stream or Share
step3.desc: Stream your videos instantly or share them securely with others. Control who has access to your content.

features.feature5: Withdraw earnings upon reaching minimum threshold

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join our community today and experience the best service we have to offer.

footer.description: Secure cloud storage and file sharing platform. Store, share, and earn with confidence.

storage.title: Your Safe Place to Store Data
storage.description: Mega Box is a secure and reliable cloud platform designed to protect everything you care about. From important documents and business files to personal photos and videos, your data is always encrypted and stored safely.
storage.whyChooseDesc: We believe storing your data should be simple and stress-free. Here are some reasons why thousands of users trust Mega Box every day:

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: Every file you upload is protected with state-of-the-art encryption, ensuring your data stays private and secure.

storage.title: Generous Storage
storage.description: Enjoy up to {storage} of cloud space, giving you the freedom to save, organize, and access all your content whenever you need it.

access.title: Seamless Access
access.description: Whether you're working on your laptop, tablet, or phone, Mega Box keeps your files in sync across all your devices.

sharing.title: Safe Sharing Links
sharing.description: Share your files with confidence using secure links that protect your content and control who can access it.

earnings.title: Earn Money Safely with Mega Box
earnings.description: Mega Box isn't just a place to store your files—it's a platform where you can share your content and earn income securely. Whether you create videos, documents, or digital products, Mega Box makes it easy to monetize your work with confidence.
earnings.whyTrust: Why trust Mega Box for your earnings?
earnings.whyTrustDesc: We are committed to helping you grow your revenue while keeping your data and payments fully protected. Here are some of the reasons creators and businesses rely on us:

transactions.title: Secure Transactions
transactions.description: All financial operations are encrypted and processed through trusted payment providers, ensuring your earnings reach you safely and quickly.

content.title: Protected Content
content.description: Your files remain secure behind robust encryption, so you can confidently share your work without worrying about unauthorized access.

monetization.title: Flexible Monetization
monetization.description: Set your own prices, offer subscriptions, or share paid downloads—Mega Box gives you the tools to earn on your terms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about MegaBox referral program and services

q1.question: Why join the MegaBox referral program?
q1.answer: MegaBox is an innovative cloud storage app that offers 1024 GB of free lifetime cloud storage. Join the program and let's grow and succeed together.

q2.question: How can I earn commissions?
q2.answer: You earn a commission every time a new user registers on MegaBox using the link you shared.

q3.question: How can I track my commission?
q3.answer: You will be able to view detailed reports about your commissions and the number of registrations through your shared link in the Admin Center.

q4.question: When and how do I get paid?
q4.answer: You can see reward details in the Admin Center and withdraw your rewards. (This feature will be available in July 2025.) We will provide a dashboard where you can access all payout information.

q5.question: What does it cost to join?
q5.answer: Joining the program is completely free. You don't need to pay anything.

earning.trackPerformance: Track your content performance and earnings
earning.startSharing: Start sharing your files to see analytics here!
earning.top10Description: Only display the top 10 items with the highest number of views. Shared links start counting from May 13, 2024
earning.withdrawableDescription: This is the total amount you can withdraw. You can request a withdrawal at any time.
earning.estimatedIncomeDescription: This is your estimated income based on pending rewards. This amount will be confirmed after verification.
earning.actualIncomeDescription: This is your confirmed and settled income. This amount has been verified and is ready for withdrawal.
earning.totalViewsDescription: Total number of views across all your shared content. This includes all views from shared links.
earning.totalDownloadsDescription: Total number of downloads across all your shared content. This includes all downloads from shared links.
earning.totalLinksDescription: Total number of shared links you have created. Each link represents a piece of content you've shared.
